Sustainability has two arms: one to understand the risks, the other is that we have to do something about it. On the first arm, progress is magnificent, but to change the way we act, we need more investment and that is a slower path, says Christian Thimann #EIOPAconference
Can you have decent long-term returns without sustainability? If you do things properly, I think you can have both. says @gprache @Better_Finance #EIOPAconference

'Need someone to organise and facilitate enhanced cooperation between national supervisors,' says EIOPA's Patrick Hoedjes. 'There's a willingness, but need to create systems so that cooperation is easier.' #EIOPAconference

'In many countries, there is a lack of information and lack of awareness of what is being sold to consumers. There is an opportunity to do more and do better in terms of communication and cooperation between national supervisors' EIOPA's Patrick Hoedjes #EIOPAconference
'We need to make sure that the internal market functions, we need to protect it and make sure that it retains the trust of consumers,' says EIOPA's Patrick Hoedjes #EIOPAconference

'Level playing field good for consumers, good for competition' says says @kevintt1969 from @insurance_irl
'Standards - harmonisation and raising of standards - and cooperation important priorities for us in cross-border business' says @kevintt1969 from @insurance_irl

'Information is very important. Not all information is given to policyholders. The role of intermediaries is crucial here. Must provide the name of the real insurer to policyholders.' says Philippe Poiget from @FFA_assurance #EIOPAconference
